mapper.select: select count(mid) from member_exp_record where uid = #{uid} and mid = #{mid}

(select 'point' `type`, uid, mid, reason, point_change `change`, create_time from member_point_record where uid = #{uid} and mid = #{mid}) UNION ALL (select 'exp' `type`, uid, mid, reason, exp_change `change`, create_time from member_exp_record where uid = #{uid} and mid = #{mid})
ORDER BY create_time DESC limit #{offset}, #{limit}
